content:
I want to start a discussion regarding a recent code change in PR #26301. @Sahil Batra suggests a consideration for displaying a triangle indicator for bot users and not for guest users when a bot's role is set to guest.

@Sahil Batra mentions the possibility of adjusting the placement of the is_guest condition within the code to achieve this effect. However, there's uncertainty about the best approach. I'd appreciate your input on this matter to determine the most suitable solution for our design.

The goal is to maintain a consistent and visually clear distinction between bot users and guest users. Your insights and suggestions would be valuable in making an informed decision.

You can find the relevant PR here: PR #26301

@epekipolu enoch https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/26301#discussion_r1299824051 is a more direct link to the comment. (You can click on the time next to a comment in GH to get the link. It's not super intuitive, but it works. :smile:)

I don't have any opinion on the particular issue, just trying to be helpful.

Thank you it was helpful
So is it that a non-guest bot gets a different-colored triangle from guests and guest bots, which get the same color as each other?
Some screen shots of the different options could be a help here :)
#26301 checks if a user is a bot and adds a dark-grey indicator at he bottom right of the avatar. I think @Sahil Batra is asking for an adjustment when a bot's role is set to guest

We show an indicator for guest users and #26301 adds a different indicator for bots. What I am saying is that if a bot's role is set to "guest", the indicator should be the one which is shown for bots and not the one shown for guests.
Got it. It makes more sense to group bots together like that.
Yeah, I agree that for user that is both a bot and a guest, the "bot" indicator is more important.

I don't know if others feel differently, but I'm in general not excited about the design direction of adding a triangle to bot avatars. It's pretty hard to figure out what such a triangle means. (We've been talking about getting rid of the similar triangle for guests, and perhaps replacing it with a border.)

I'd propose that we close out #25969 and the linked PR in favor of Consistently show bot icon after bot name #26831.
